short_summary: The Department of National Defence DRDC Suffield Research Centre has a requirement for a spectrograph and high dynamic range electronic streak camera, to perform time resolved spectroscopy.
description: The Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System will be used to perform time resolved spectroscopy for single shot events in the ultraviolet to visible spectral range.
full_summary:
### Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System Digital Document Notice
#### Public Works and Government Services Canada Tender Notice

**Solicitation Number and Title**
WS3744824114 - W7714-238487 Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System

**Description of the Goods and Services**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a spectrograph and high dynamic range electronic streak camera to conduct time-resolved spectroscopy for single-shot events in the ultraviolet to visible spectral range.

**Deliverables and Dates**
The following goods and services are required to be delivered by the following dates:

* Spectrograph and streak camera imager system: on or before March 31, 2023
* Operation and technical manuals: on or before March 31, 2023
* Training: after March 31, 2023, as scheduled with the technical authority

**Tender Information**

* Tender closing date: December 12, 2022 at 14:00 HNR
* Tender description: The successful bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing date
* Selection criteria: Lowest price
* Trade agreements applicable: The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information**

* Nafissa Diop, Director (SPAC/PSPC)
* nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Other Details**

* Contact person: Diop, Nafissa (SPAC/PSPC)
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14606135?extsite=MTQ2MDYxMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that the re written version only contains the necessary information to complete the tender process, while omitting unnecessary details.

Format your output in Markdown.
